Room.Name: Ragnar's Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a wide road, north of Castle Ragnar. A copse of trees is nearby.
Room.LongDescription: A wonderful white castle, with spires and turrets and snapping banners and pennants is immediately south. It looks to be a very busy place, with many people coming and going. The trees to the east are near a placid pond. Immediately north is a toll booth for the Lyanden Road.
